net.adamcin.oakpal.webster

Class JcrFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.adamcin.oakpal.webster.JcrFactory

  • public final class JcrFactory
extends Object
    JCR Repository factory for NodeStoreFixture instances defined by oak-run option sets.

    • Method Detail

      • getJcr

        public static javax.jcr.Repository getJcr(org.apache.jackrabbit.oak.run.cli.NodeStoreFixture nodeStoreFixture)
                                   throws IOException,
                                          org.apache.jackrabbit.oak.api.CommitFailedException
        Create an in-memory JCR repository backed by a read-only composite mount on top of the provided node store fixture.
        Parameters:
        nodeStoreFixture - seed node store defined by oak-run option sets
        Returns:
        a working JCR Repository for use with admin/admin credentials
        Throws:
        IOException - if InitialContentMigrator.migrate() throws
        org.apache.jackrabbit.oak.api.CommitFailedException - if InitialContentMigrator.migrate() throws

      • getJcr

        public static javax.jcr.Repository getJcr(org.apache.jackrabbit.oak.run.cli.NodeStoreFixture nodeStoreFixture,
                                          org.apache.jackrabbit.oak.spi.state.NodeStore globalStore)
                                   throws IOException,
                                          org.apache.jackrabbit.oak.api.CommitFailedException
        Create an in-memory JCR repository backed by a read-only composite mount on top of the provided node store fixture.
        Parameters:
        nodeStoreFixture - seed node store defined by oak-run option sets
        globalStore - a read/write node store to initialize as the composite global store
        Returns:
        a working JCR Repository for use with admin/admin credentials
        Throws:
        IOException - if InitialContentMigrator.migrate() throws
        org.apache.jackrabbit.oak.api.CommitFailedException - if InitialContentMigrator.migrate() throws
